p: Mapped reads against the reference transcriptome encompassed > 90% of the total reads used for the analysis (see supplementary Table S3 online). A total of 8460 differentially expressed transcripts (DETs) were found significant (adjusted p-value ≤ 0.05) at day 1 of regeneration (Fig. 2A). Upregulated transcripts (Log2 Fold Change ≥ 2) comprised 3585, while downregulated (Log2 Fold Change ≤ − 2) were 4875. On day 3 of regeneration, the total number of transcripts with differential expression was 8216, of these 3663 were upregulated and 4553 downregulated (Fig. 2B). When both days 1 and 3 regenerating intestines were compared to controls, a total of 3884 transcripts were differentially co-expressed on both days; 1723 were upregulated and 2161 downregulated (Fig. 2C).
